content.description: An array of configurations for items that will be created as children of this item

type.description: The type of the item. Possible values are 'row', 'column', 'stack', 'component' and 'react-component'

componentName.description: The name of the component as specified in layout.registerComponent. Mandatory if type is 'component'

componentState.description: A serialisable object. Will be passed to the component constructor function and will be the value returned by container.getState()

id.description: A String or an Array of Strings. Used to retrieve the item using item.getItemsById()

width.description: The width of this item, relative to the other children of its parent in percent

height.description: The height of this item, relative to the other children of its parent in percent

isClosable.description: Determines if the item is closable. If false, the x on the items tab will be hidden and container.close() will return false

title.description: The title of the item as displayed on its tab and on popout windows

activeItemIndex.description: The index of the initially selected tab
